metadata.title: CVE-2018-16758 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Missing message authentication in the meta-protocol in Tinc VPN version1.0.34 and earlier allows a man-in-the-middle attack to disable theencryption of VPN packets.

criterions.comment: tinc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
